description:
Following his second defeat by Mega Man, Dr. Wily has finally come to his senses. He and Dr. Light begin work on
Gamma, a giant peacekeeping robot. However, Gamma's power source, the Energy Elements, are being guarded by the
Robot Masters sent to retrieve them. It's up to Mega Man to retrieve the Energy Elements and defeat the mastermind
behind the Robot Masters' betrayal.

mm3_0.1.0.description:
# Features
* Consumable Checks, adding 139 new location checks
* EnergyLink support

# Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where defeating Needle Man or Shadow Man would destroy the game's internal state, leading to various issues
* Fixed Wily bosses not sending their locations (and Gamma not sending goal).
* Fixed an issue where Break Man had no logic. Whoops.
* Fixed an issue where logic believed Gemini Laser could be used 28 times instead of 14.
mm3_0.1.0.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.0

mm3_0.1.1.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed randomized weaknesses not accounting for Kamegoro Maker
* Fixed EnergyLink not being set properly when disabled
* Fixed Mega Man's color being default when entering a stage
* Fixed consumable 1-Ups counting for both EnergyLink and checks
* Fixed seedbleed on shuffled weaknesses
* Improved consistency of solo generations
mm3_0.1.1.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.1

mm3_0.1.2r3.description:
# New Features
* Reduce Flashing, which slows the flashing in specific stages (Spark/Shadow/Gemini/Gamma)
* Doc Robot stage completions are now saved to the datastorage, and should restore between separate play sessions

# Bug Fixes
* Now playable on Archipelago 0.6.2
* Fixed a missing logic rule for a set of consumables in Spark Man's stage
* Shadow Man no longer takes vanilla damage while he is sliding
* EnergyLink can finally be disabled properly
* Fixed DeathLink being sent out repeatedly during game overs
* Fixed potentially causing certain other NES games to be unplayable
* Fixed another issue where you could access Search Snake/Spark Shock/Shadow Blade by having the corresponding Rush item.
* Fixed an issue where entering Break Man's stage could send out consumable locations from another stage
* Improved Get Equipped color generation.

# NOTICE:
At the current moment, there is a bug within the Final Fantasy 1 apworld shipped with Archipelago 0.6.2 that causes Mega Man 3 to be unplayable. You will need to remove the FF1 apworld in order to play this game. There should be no issue in the reverse direction.
mm3_0.1.2r3.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.2

mm3_0.1.3.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed Get Equipped screen always cutting off the first line of text
* Adjusted the alignment of text on the Get Equipped screen
* Access Codes are now colored properly when displayed on the Get Equipped screen (and in other games)

# Other Changes
* Robot Masters and Doc Robot now have their colors randomized with palette shuffle.
mm3_0.1.3.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.3

mm3_0.1.4.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed generation on Archipelago 0.6.4

# Other Changes
* Added Get Equipped colors for Mega Man X4 and certain Metroid items.
mm3_0.1.4.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.4

mm3_0.1.5.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed client being non-functional on AP 0.6.3.
* Fixed mismatched version reporting between AP 0.6.3 and 0.6.4.
mm3_0.1.5.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.5

mm3_0.1.6.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fixed reading from Proteus.exe following the recent Mega Man Legacy Collection update.
* Fixed music shuffle being completely non-functional
* Fixed small Weapon Energy pickups being non-functional if consumable pickups are set to none or 1-Up/E-Tank
mm3_0.1.6.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.6

mm3_0.1.7.description:
# Bug Fixes
* Fix a rare seedbleed issue that could cause generation to fail
* Fixed the last Health Energy in Magnet Man's stage being referred to as Weapon Energy
* Fixed Wily Stage 2 - Weapon Energy 1 not sending
* Fixed an error being prointed to the client when hovering over the Command button or running /help
* Fixed the menu allowing access to unreceived Rush items, again.

# Other Changes
* Refactored location and region creation
  * As a part of this, new location groups have been added: `Break Man`, `Wily Stage 1`, `Wily Stage 2`, `Wily Stage 3`, `Wily Stage 4`, `Wily Stage 5`, `Wily Stage 6`.
* Removed Archipelago 0.6.3 back-compatibility.
mm3_0.1.7.title: Mega Man 3 APWorld v0.1.7
